title: Big Data for the Enterprise - High Availability and Disaster Recovery with MarkLogic
abstract: What happens to your business when a machine fails or your data center suffers a catastrophic event? Wayne Feick, Principal Engineer working on MarkLogic Server, will describe how to keep your application running in the face of individual host failures or even the loss of your entire data center. Technologies discussed will include forest-level failover, replication, distributed transactions, backups, and point-in-time recovery.

surveys.comments: Concise presentation of very useful information.
Need some examples.  There was good explanation but some examples and some step by steps would be great
Good talk. Need more details on failover in clusters and replication and what to plan for.
